articles.title: KFC serves up Zinger Kebab nationwide in Australia
articles.author: Matthew Leong
articles.summary: KFC Australia launched the Zinger Kebab nationwide on Tuesday, August 5th, for a limited time. The Zinger Kebab features a Zinger fillet, tabouli, garlic sauce, lettuce, and Supercharged Sauce in a flatbread. It is available solo, in a Combo, or as part of a Box and can be ordered through the KFC App.

articles.title: 31 Amazon Dresses That'll Get Compliments
articles.author: Cierra Cowan
articles.summary: Various dresses are available for purchase, each with unique features, sizes, and colors. Prices range from \$10 to \$48.99. Customer reviews highlight the comfort, fit, and aesthetic appeal of the dresses, with many reviewers mentioning receiving compliments when wearing them.

articles.title: 32 Low-Cost Products With High-Cost Behavior
articles.author: Taylor Steele
articles.summary: Catrice introduced an under-eye brightener with hyaluronic acid and shea butter. John Frieda launched a hair-lightening spray that can lighten hair by up to two shades. Monday Haircare released a gardenia-scented dry shampoo with a keratin-enriched formula.

articles.title: This $7 Old School Powder Perfects My Skin
articles.author: Tessa Flores
articles.summary: The Coty Airspun loose powder, originally formulated in 1935 and now talc-free, offers a silky soft veil for the skin, blurring imperfections and securing foundation. Users praise its ability to prevent settling into fine lines and control shine without drying the skin. The product is available on Amazon for $6.74.

articles.title: GameSir G7 Pro Review: Yes Sir, It's A Game-Changing Pro Controller
articles.author: Matt Gardner
articles.summary: GameSir has launched the G7 Pro controller for Xbox, PC, and mobile, focusing on function over aesthetics. The G7 Pro features programmable shoulder buttons, trigger locks, and magnetic faceplates, offering flexibility and a premium feel. Mechanical buttons and clicky hair triggers enhance the gaming experience.

articles.title: Florist startup entrepreneur launches gift-giving platform
articles.author: Stuff
articles.summary: Claudia Boyo launched ForgetMeNot Gifts NZ, providing customers with a combined service of buying flowers and gifts.

articles.title: 28 Items You'll Be So Smug With At Your Next Outdoor Hang
articles.author: Jessica Hall
articles.summary: The article highlights new product introductions such as DEET-free mosquito-repelling bracelets, fly-repellent table fans, a 360-degree portable neck fan, and a six-pack of mini cell phone fans. It also features the launch of Sol De Janeiro's SPF 50 Rio Radiance Body Oil and a color-changing LED flying disc.

articles.title: Kim Kardashian Reacts To Anthony Hopkins Mocking Wraps
articles.author: Chelsea Stewart
articles.summary: A new "Seamless Sculpt Face Wrap" was recently unveiled.

articles.title: Golden Penny holds inaugural food festival in Enugu
articles.author: Ibrahim Adam
articles.summary: Golden Penny Foods hosted its inaugural Golden Penny Food Festival in Enugu to deepen consumer engagement and showcase its diverse portfolio of food products. The festival featured food tasting, live cooking demonstrations, and product exhibitions to offer participants a holistic brand experience, promoting existing products like pasta, noodles, cereals, and oil.

articles.title: 26 Products To Keep Your Body Temple In Tip-Top Shape
articles.author: Negesti Kaudo
articles.summary: Gold Bond introduced a firming neck and chest cream containing salicylic acid, glycerin, and aloe. Sol De Janeiro launched Bum Bum Cream, featuring guarana extract and coconut oil for firming and moisturizing skin with a salted caramel, pistachio, and vanilla scent. TruSkin released a vitamin C serum, including vitamins C and E, plus hyaluronic acid, which helps reduce the appearance of wrinkles and dark spots.

articles.title: 24 Whimsical Products That Put The Fun In Functional
articles.author: Divinia Tarin
articles.summary: TonyMoly introduced a Jelly Lip Melt in a Jell-O mold-inspired container, featuring berry extract and vitamin E for hydration. Vacation launched Classic Whip SPF 30, a sunscreen with a dessert-like consistency, coconut oil, aloe vera, and banana extract. Additionally, floral Band-Aids were released in a limited edition, featuring wildflower designs.

articles.title: 46 Genius Products To Improve Your Home Instantly
articles.author: Elizabeth Lilly
articles.summary: The article introduces a variety of new products designed for home improvement and organization. These include innovative solutions like adjustable closet doublers, cooling misting systems, expandable under-sink kits, and various organizers for fridge, drawers, and closets, along with specialized cleaning tools and gadgets to enhance everyday living.

articles.title: Photos of the dual-screen Windows Phone that never was emerged online, and we wish it released
articles.author: Simon Batt
articles.summary: A prototype of Microsoft's Surface Andromeda, intended as a new range of Windows Phones, has surfaced. This device, which was ultimately canceled and its work repurposed into the Surface Duo, features a dual-screen design and envisioned as a potential mobile offering. The prototype is listed for sale, providing a glimpse into Microsoft's abandoned mobile strategy.

articles.title: Aldi Ireland fans set to love major makeup dupe in middle aisle – and it's €28 cheaper
articles.author: Isabela Boechat
articles.summary: Aldi Ireland introduces the Lacura Perfect Skin Tint, a lightweight tinted moisturizer available in six shades for €5.99. The product is positioned as a dupe for the Fenty Beauty Eaze Drop Blurring Skin Tint. Availability may vary by store and region, with updates on Aldi's website.

articles.title: Cyberpunk 2077: Ultimate Edition on Nintendo Switch 2 proves that I don't need a Steam ...
articles.author: Tech Radar
articles.summary: Cyberpunk 2077: Ultimate Edition is positioned as an ambitious port for the Nintendo Switch 2. The game demonstrates the capabilities of the console upon its launch.

articles.title: Lidl Ireland fans rushing to buy major €24.99 staple for drying clothes in middle aisle – and it has special feature
articles.author: Macarten Burke
articles.summary: Lidl Ireland has introduced the Vileda Clothes Airer priced at €24.99 and the Vileda Tower Clothes Airer for €34.99. The Vileda Clothes Airer is a space-efficient indoor drying solution with an 18m drying line and a sock holder, while the Vileda Tower Clothes Airer has a 30m drying rack with holders for hangers.

articles.title: Walmart slashed $390 off the price of this nugget ice maker
articles.author: Danielle Halibey
articles.summary: The Qunler Nugget Ice Maker is on sale for $200 at Walmart. It produces 44 pounds of nugget ice per day, with the first batch ready in 10 minutes, and holds up to 2.6 pounds of ice. The ice maker features dual tanks, a self-cleaning function, and is marketed as space-saving.

articles.title: You've Probably Been Eyeing These 41 Wildly Popular Products For A While, And I'm Here To Tell You They're Worth It
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: Gold Bond introduced firming neck and chest cream, formulated to hydrate and tighten skin. Laneige launched Neo Blurring Powder designed to absorb oil and blur pores. Band-Aid released a set of limited edition wildflower Band-Aids. Clinique is offering Almost Lipstick Tinted Lip Balm in Black Honey. Catrice has released "Instant Awake" Under Eye Brightener, now in four shades, to conceal and brighten dark circles. Neutrogena introduced Dry-Touch SPF 70 Sunscreen with a matte finish for sun protection. E.l.f launched Lash Xtndr Tubing Mascara designed for thin or fragile lashes.

articles.title: If You'd Describe Yourself As A Neat Freak, I Honestly Can't Believe You Don't Already Have These 54 Products
articles.author: Maitland Quitmeyer
articles.summary: Several cleaning and home organization products are introduced. These include the Tineco 2-in-1 cordless vacuum and mop and the Shark Steam & Scrub steam mop, which offer innovative cleaning solutions for hard floors. Additionally, Bissell CleanView bagless vacuum with a specialized brush roll is designed for picking up embedded pet hair and the Roomba robot vacuum with increased suction power offers autonomous cleaning capabilities.

articles.title: Devon is to get a new MacDonald's with drive-through
articles.author: newsdesk@devonlive.com
articles.summary: McDonald's is planning to open a new restaurant with a drive-through in Torquay at Kerswell Gardens, adjacent to Torquay road. The site will also feature an 8m illuminated sign and will be located near existing McDonald's branches.

articles.title: Bargain Brand Foods opens its doors for the first time in Portsmouth as shoppers check out its range of products
articles.author: Joe Williams
articles.summary: Bargain Brand Foods opened a new store on Charlotte Street on August 2nd. The store offers a variety of discounted products, including food items from brands like Heinz and Walkers that are close to or have passed their 'best before' dates, as well as non-food items like pillows, dog beds, and cleaning products.

articles.title: Google App Revival: Huawei Phones Back in the Running
articles.summary: Google might resume offering its Google Mobile Services (GMS) on Huawei devices, potentially marking a turning point after years of restrictions. This resumption could significantly boost Huawei's smartphone sales and market share, allowing it to better compete against rivals. For Google, it would mean regaining access to a significant user base in various international markets where Huawei has a strong presence.

articles.title: All 13 gadgets hitting Aldi's middle aisle today – including £9.99 tool that saves your back when lifting heavy items
articles.author: Allan Glen
articles.summary: Aldi is launching new 'Specialbuys' including a £9.99 mini hand truck designed to help lift heavy items up to 50kg, a 12v impact drill for £12.99 and an assorted LED work light set, costing £9.99 . These items, along with others like repair tape and screwdriver sets, are available while stocks last.

articles.title: Swabs of confusion
articles.author: Ellen Warren
articles.summary: Walgreens has launched "Cotton Swabs Variety Pack" with three different types of Q-tip-ish items. Q-tip has introduced a new product, the "Hygiene Shield" Q-tip, featuring an antimicrobial layer designed to protect the cotton from germs.

articles.title: Motorola Edge 60s Full Specs, Features, Price In Philippines
articles.author: Cris Sayson
articles.summary: The Motorola Edge 60s was officially announced in April 2025. This 5G smartphone features a 5500 mAh battery with 68W wired charging, a 6.67-inch P-OLED display, and runs on Android 15. It is powered by a Mediatek Dimensity 7400 processor and offers configurations with 12GB RAM and up to 512GB of internal storage.

articles.title: 'I've never used dry shampoo but I broke that rule for this pocket-sized powder alternative'
articles.author: Meghan Coon
articles.summary: Hair Gain has launched Peptide Puff Dry Shampoo, a powder alternative to aerosol dry shampoos, priced at £15 (discounted £11.45 at All Beauty). This product is designed to absorb grease and oil, add volume, and nourish hair without leaving residue, and is available at Lookfantastic, Cult Beauty, and All Beauty.

articles.title: Lava Blaze Dragon Full Specs, Features, Price In Philippines
articles.author: Cris Sayson
articles.summary: Lava officially announced the Lava Blaze Dragon on July 25, 2025, and released it on August 01, 2025. This 5G smartphone features a 50MP + 2MP main camera, an 8MP front camera, and is powered by a Qualcomm Snapdragon 4 Gen 2 SM4450 processor with a 5000 mAh battery and 18W wired charging.

articles.title: What contributes to the formation of salts on the surface of the brick?
articles.author: Daniel Foster
articles.summary: A new 'callback ordering' system is emerging to streamline online retail by allowing customers to request a callback from a sales representative instead of filling out lengthy registration forms. The representative then handles order placement and account creation, aiming to reduce cart abandonment and enhance customer satisfaction. This system also has potential SEO benefits such as lower bounce rates and increased conversion rates.

articles.title: ‘Work of art': Fans gush over Tom Holland's brand-new suit for upcoming Spider-Man movie
articles.author: Tom Holland
articles.summary: Marvel Entertainment revealed a brand new Spider-Man suit for the upcoming film Spider-Man: Brand New Day. The suit, showcased in a video featuring Tom Holland, features darker red and blue tones and a larger spider insignia, drawing comparisons to previous suits and generating excitement among fans.

articles.title: 27 Wayfair Products To Transform Your Bathroom
articles.author: Becca Glasser-Baker
articles.summary: The article presents a range of new bathroom products available for purchase. These include items like a freestanding bathroom cabinet, ruffle shower curtain, stylish trash can, toothbrush holder, shower caddy, toilet paper holder, toilet brush and plunger set, matching rugs, curved curtain rod, mirrors, over-the-toilet storage, scallop-edge shower curtain, peel-and-stick tiles, light bar, shower liner, towels, faucet, hand-towel ring, Moen towel bar, rainfall showerhead, bathroom accessories, magnifying makeup mirror, bathroom tray, makeup organizer, tissue box cover, soap dispenser, and shower curtain hook.

articles.title: Samsung finally cracks the code with its latest foldable smartphones
articles.author: Daniel Smith
articles.summary: Samsung introduces the Galaxy Z Fold7 and Flip7 series of foldable smartphones. The Galaxy Z Fold7 features a slim design, an 8-inch screen, and One UI 8 based on Android 16 and AI integration. The Flip7 and Flip7 FE cater to selfie and vlog creators, offering improved cameras and a customizable front screen, and Samsung offers trade-in deals and a 100-day return policy to promote the new devices.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Tab S10+ deal on Sky will bag two £449 freebies
articles.author: mylondonnewsdesk@reachplc.com
articles.summary: Samsung is promoting its Galaxy Tab S10+ tablet, which features a 14.6-inch AMOLED screen, 120Hz refresh rate, and a 10,090mAh battery. Sky is offering the device at £29 per month over 36 months, with free Galaxy AI keyboard and Buds3 Pro included.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Z Flip 7 – Flip Charm Meets Power
articles.summary: Samsung has introduced the Galaxy Z Fold 7, a foldable phone featuring an 8-inch main AMOLED display, a 6.5-inch cover screen, and a 200MP camera. Powered by the Snapdragon 8 Elite and enhanced with Galaxy AI features on Android 16 / One UI 8, the Z Fold 7 is encased in Armor Aluminum and has an IP48 rating.

articles.title: Amazon's number one robot vacuum is 57% off for shoppers doing one simple thing
articles.author: Jake Hackney
articles.summary: Amazon is offering a significant discount on the Monsga 3-in-1 Robot Vacuum with Mop, reducing the price from £289 to £124 with an additional tickbox discount. This best-selling robotic vacuum features a mop function, anti-tangle brushroll, and multiple cleaning modes and offers a cheaper alternative to competitors like Shark Matrix. Customer reviews on Amazon indicate high satisfaction with the product's cleaning capabilities and convenience.

articles.title: Triona McCarthy: Whether the sun is in or out, it's important to make sure you have the right SPF product
articles.author: Triona McCarthy
articles.summary: Ultra Violette launched Future Fluid Superlight Mineral Skinscreen SPF 50, a lightweight zinc SPF. Nivea introduced Sun UV Face 2in1 Daily Primer Face Serum SPF 50, offering UVA/UVB protection. NeoStrata offers Matrix Support SPF 30, a day cream targeting the skin's hydrating matrix. Piz Buin has Moisturising Face Cream, contains sunflower oil and vitamin E to provide intense moisturisation to help the skin's natural hydration level while tanning. Beauty of Joseon offers Ginseng Moist Sun Serum SPF 50 with anti-ageing effects. Kiehl's released Ingrown Hair and Tone Correcting Intimate Drops. ORA Clinic introduced ORA Power+ Facial combines five technologies in one.

articles.title: New Streamer Wanzami TV Debuts with Pay-Per-View, Originals
articles.author: Thisday
articles.summary: Wanzami TV, a new streaming platform, launched with a pay-per-view model and no subscription. The launch event was held at EbonyLife Place.

articles.title: Five easy 'Aldi-only' recipes for families to try out this summer
articles.author: Andrew Nuttall
articles.summary: Aldi is introducing five fresh summer recipes, including Lemongrass Pork Kebabs, Mexican Bean and Rice Salad, Chicken Salad Pittas, Healthy Summer Tacos, and Fruit Popsicles. These recipes are designed for alfresco dining and sunny picnics, using ingredients available at Aldi.

articles.title: 问界汽车推出六大交付承诺 1小时提车_手机网易网
articles.author: 手机中国
articles.summary: AITO (Wenjie) officially announced six delivery promises aimed at simplifying procedures and providing transparent, efficient, and reliable delivery guarantees. These promises include transparent sales practices, secure payment processing, high-quality vehicle delivery, careful vehicle preparation, professional vehicle training, and expedited one-hour delivery.

articles.title: I tested this rugged phone with an integrated projector, and it's surprisingly good if a little niche
articles.author: Alastair Jennings
articles.summary: 8849 has launched the Tank 4 and Tank 4 Pro, rugged smartphones featuring an integrated 720p projector. The Tank 4 boasts a CPU and GPU boost, resolution upgrade, and IP68 credentials, making it suitable for outdoor use. The phone has been designed slimmer than previous models with a 6.78-inch screen.

articles.title: 'Powerful' speaker perfect for summer holidays on offer for nearly 40% off
articles.author: Stephen Porzio
articles.summary: A Bluetooth speaker features lights that synchronize with music, which can be turned off. It is IPX7 waterproof with a 30-hour battery, and it's resistant to rain, dust, snow and spills.

articles.title: This 6-Passenger EV SUV Is Coming for the Model Y's Crown—and It's Not from Elon
articles.author: Chris Bennett
articles.summary: Li Auto is launching its new six-passenger electric SUV, the Li i8, which features a high-voltage battery platform, ultra-fast charging capabilities, and a spacious design. Deliveries are scheduled to begin on August 20.

articles.title: NYT Mini crossword answers, hints for August 2, 2025
articles.author: Mashable Team
articles.summary: The New York Times offers 'The Mini,' a smaller version of its daily crossword puzzle.  Peloton is a company known for its exercise bikes.  The article also mentions the NYT Strands game and provides hints for it.

articles.title: Today's Game-Changing 'Spider-Man: Brand New Day' Tease Proves That Superhero Fatigue Will Never Apply to Him
articles.author: Collider
articles.summary: Spider-Man is officially featuring a new costume in Brand New Day, representing the suit Tom Holland's Peter Parker will wear in his latest adventure. The new suit appears more practical, with raised webbing resembling Tobey.

articles.title: Orlando Bloom Gives Sly Nod to Katy Perry's Rumored New Romance
articles.author: Catherine Bouris
articles.summary: Sony released a teaser for Spider-Man: Brand New Day, featuring Tom Holland in a new Spidey suit. The film, scheduled for release on July 31, 2026, will be shot in real locations.

articles.title: Can the Switch 2 Fix Pok�mon?
articles.author: Game Rant
articles.summary: The Nintendo Switch 2's release aims to resolve performance issues in the Pokémon series. This upgrade could significantly improve the performance of the upcoming Pokémon Legends: Z-A and future titles.
